title: A Game of Thrones
author: George R.R. Martin
description: The first book in the epic fantasy series A Song of Ice and Fire. Follow the political intrigue and warfare in the Seven Kingdoms of Westeros.

title: The Hobbit
author: J.R.R. Tolkien
description: A hobbit named Bilbo Baggins goes on an unexpected adventure with thirteen dwarves to reclaim their homeland from a dragon.

title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
author: J.K. Rowling
description: A young wizard discovers his magical heritage and attends Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

title: The Lord of the Rings
author: J.R.R. Tolkien
description: The epic tale of the One Ring and the quest to destroy it in the fires of Mount Doom.

title: A Clash of Kings
author: George R.R. Martin
description: The second book in A Song of Ice and Fire series. The War of Five Kings tears the land apart.

title: The Catcher in the Rye
author: J.D. Salinger
description: A teenager's journey through New York City as he struggles with alienation and identity.

title: Of Mice and Men
author: John Steinbeck
description: The story of two displaced migrant ranch workers during the Great Depression.

title: The Great Gatsby
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
description: A critique of the American Dream through the eyes of narrator Nick Carraway.

title: To Kill a Mockingbird
author: Harper Lee
description: A story of racial injustice and childhood innocence in the American South.

author: George Orwell
description: A totalitarian society where Big Brother watches everything and controls thought.

title: Dune
author: Frank Herbert
description: A epic science fiction novel set on the desert planet Arrakis.

title: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy
author: Douglas Adams
description: A comedic science fiction series about the last surviving man after Earth's destruction.

title: Neuromancer
author: William Gibson
description: A cyberpunk novel about a washed-up computer hacker hired for one last job.

title: Foundation
author: Isaac Asimov
description: The first book in the Foundation series about the fall and rise of galactic civilization.

title: Mistborn: The Final Empire
author: Brandon Sanderson
description: A thief attempts to overthrow an immortal emperor in a world of ash and magic.

title: The Way of Kings
author: Brandon Sanderson
description: The first book in the Stormlight Archive series set on the storm-ravaged world of Roshar.

title: The Name of the Wind
author: Patrick Rothfuss
description: The story of Kvothe as told by himself to a chronicler.

title: The Eye of the World
author: Robert Jordan
description: The first book in The Wheel of Time series following Rand al'Thor and his friends.

title: Ender's Game
author: Orson Scott Card
description: A young boy is trained to fight in an interstellar war against an alien race.

title: Hyperion
author: Dan Simmons
description: Seven pilgrims journey to the mysterious world of Hyperion.

title: The Da Vinci Code
author: Dan Brown
description: A symbologist uncovers a conspiracy involving the Catholic Church and the Holy Grail.

title: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo
author: Stieg Larsson
description: A journalist and a hacker investigate a wealthy family's dark secrets.

title: Gone Girl
author: Gillian Flynn
description: A man becomes the prime suspect when his wife disappears on their anniversary.

title: Twilight
author: Stephenie Meyer
description: A teenage girl falls in love with a vampire.

title: The Martian
author: Andy Weir
description: An astronaut stranded on Mars must use his ingenuity to survive.

title: Eleven Minutes
author: Paulo Coelho
description: A young Brazilian girl's journey of self-discovery through love and sexuality.

title: The Alchemist
author: Paulo Coelho
description: A young shepherd's journey to find treasure teaches him about following his dreams.

title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
author: J.K. Rowling
description: Harry competes in the dangerous Triwizard Tournament.

title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
author: J.K. Rowling
description: Harry faces the return of Voldemort and forms Dumbledore's Army.

title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
author: J.K. Rowling
description: Harry learns about Voldemort's past while preparing for the final battle.

title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows
author: J.K. Rowling
description: The final book in the Harry Potter series.

title: The Kite Runner
author: Khaled Hosseini
description: A story of friendship and redemption set against the backdrop of Afghanistan's tumultuous history.

title: Life of Pi
author: Yann Martel
description: A young man survives 227 days stranded on a lifeboat with a Bengal tiger.

title: The Hunger Games
author: Suzanne Collins
description: A girl volunteers to take her sister's place in a televised fight to the death.

title: Catching Fire
author: Suzanne Collins
description: Katniss becomes a symbol of rebellion against the Capitol.

title: Mockingjay
author: Suzanne Collins
description: The final book in The Hunger Games trilogy.

title: The Alchemist
author: Paulo Coelho
description: A shepherd boy's journey to find his personal legend.

title: Pride and Prejudice
author: Jane Austen
description: The story of Elizabeth Bennet and her complex relationship with Mr. Darcy.

title: Jane Eyre
author: Charlotte Bronte
description: An orphaned girl becomes a governess and falls in love with her brooding employer.

title: Wuthering Heights
author: Emily Bronte
description: A tale of passionate and destructive love on the Yorkshire moors.

title: Brave New World
author: Aldous Huxley
description: A society where people are genetically engineered and conditioned for their roles.
